answers.text: At least once per month or when you see an opportunity to help.
When it's a really important cause.
You wish you did more, but money, time, or other constraints make it hard.

allQuestion.text: How often do you volunteer, donate, or do a favor expecting nothing in return?

answers.text: Depends on the situation. You wouldn't want to hurt anyone.

allQuestion.text: Would you lie if you would benefit from it and no one would ever find out the truth?

answers.text: Defend him or her, even if it puts you in danger.
Defend him or her, but only if there's no risk of personal harm.
You might join in - hey, it's all in fun!

allQuestion.text: An innocent person is being bullied. What do you do?
